It is an A.A. and R.A.C. 3 star hotel which specializes in good food and drink and besides catering for those special occasions such as weddings, there are facilities for small meetings, receptions and seminars.
It is an hotel which is extremely popular not only with tourists but also with local people. Both Mr. and Mrs. Chew are always involved in local affairs and charitable functions and the success of this country hotel is in the main due to them.
